data.text: Ayuba naxa a yaabi,
«N bara wo xa masenyi maniyɛ gbegbe mɛ.
Wo xa masenyie maniya foye ra.
Xa wo tan nan nu na tɔɔrɔfe,
Kɔnɔ n tan mu nu na rabama,
«N ma wɔyɛnyi mu n ma tɔɔrɛ bama,
Yakɔsi fa, n bara tagan.
I bara n fate birin ba n ma,
Ala xa xɔnɛ bara dutun n ma,
N yaxuie fe ɲaaxi falama n ma fe ra,
Ala mu n natanga fonike karinxie ma,
N nu bɔɲɛsa nan kui,
A xa tanbɛe n nabilinxi yire birin,
A n gerema alɔ geresoe xaaɲɛ.
N bara sunnun donma ragoro n fate ma,
Wa bara n yae gbeeli,
Kɔnɔ n mu fe ɲaaxi yo rabaxi.
Bɛndɛ, i naxa dusu n wuli xun na,
«Kelife yakɔsi ma fa, n ma seede na koore ma,
N booree na yofe n ma,
N seede xa n xun mafala Ala xɔn ma,
a xa n xun mafala barima a gbe mu luxi n xa siga,
